amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to add a new section requiring the Secretary to post a statement prominently on the web which explains that the FHA Short Refinance Program has been terminated and includes a contact for borrowers who are uncertain as to how to proceed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section requiring the Secretary to post a statement prominently on the web which explains that the FHA Short Refinance Program has been terminated and includes a contact for borrowers who are uncertain as to how to proceed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 147 (Roll no. 169).

action.text: Waters amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 147 (Roll no. 169).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Waters.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
